text: Alexei Pavlovich Tezikov (; June 22, 1978 – July 16, 2020) was a Russian professional ice hockey defenceman. He played in the National Hockey League with the Washington Capitals and Vancouver Canucks. Tezikov left North America following the 2001–02 season, returning to his native Russia to play in the Russian Superleague and Kontinental Hockey League over the next 11 years. Tezikov died on July 16, 2020, at the age of 42, after suffering a heart attack on the street.Серебряный призер МЧМ и экс-игрок «Вашингтона» Тезиков скончался в возрасте 42 лет.
